verbs.description: First lady Melania Trump [V: will] not travel with President Trump to the G7 Summit later this week or the meeting with Kim Jong Un in Singapore on June 12 .

[ARG0: First lady Melania Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: travel] [ARGM-MNR: with President Trump] [ARG1: to the G7 Summit later this week or the meeting with Kim Jong Un in Singapore on June 12] .
